content.title: Venous TOS (Paget-Schroetter)
content.definition: Effort thrombosis of subclavian vein. Young active patients. CDT followed by first rib resection.
content.statement: Venous TOS (Paget-Schroetter) is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Thoracic-Outlet-Syndrome that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

explanation.intuition: Understanding Venous TOS (Paget-Schroetter) helps build foundational knowledge. The concept connects to broader principles in the field.
explanation.key_insight: The key aspects of Venous TOS (Paget-Schroetter) include core principles, common applications, and integration with related concepts.
explanation.technical_details: Technical details involve specific mechanisms, measurements, and evidence-based applications of Venous TOS (Paget-Schroetter).

citations.source: Harrison's Principles of Internal Medicine, 21st ed. McGraw-Hill.
